title: Why it‚Äôs good and badüòÉüòî
text: This game is absolutely amazing and fun. You can play with friends and enjoy mysteries together. My point is, you should get it, yet there are some bad things about the game. First, when I‚Äôm playing a game, I might randomly get kicked from the server for doing nothing. Secondly, when I am the imposter, I might be trying to kill somebody in the game, but then some random guy presses ‚Äúmeeting‚Äù, though nobody died, and if I‚Äôm a crew mate and I‚Äôm doing my task, same thing. It just really pisses me off. So, developers, I want you to make sure if someone is calling a meeting, you should make sure that something happened like sabotage, or a death. Not just for no reason. And make sure when people are trying to kick someone, that person they are kicking ACTUALLY did something inappropriate for the game. Otherwise, this game is absolutely amazing and very fun for my and my family.
